price: Onlardan sonra da o yerdə sizi sakin edəcəyik. Bu, həm hüzurumda durmaqdan, həm də təhdidimdən qorxan kimsələr üçündür”.
arabic: وَلَنُسۡكِنَنَّكُمُ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِمۡۚ ذَٰلِكَ لِمَنۡ خَافَ مَقَامِي وَخَافَ وَعِيدِ

version.title: Azerbaijani translation - Ali Khan Mosaiv
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Azerbaijani by Khan Mosaiv. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walanus'kinannakumu al-arḍa min baʿdihim dhālika liman khāfa maqāmī wakhāfa waʿīdi
translations: And surely We will make you dwell
